org.jetel.ctl.extensions

Class TLFormatterCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.ctl.extensions.TLCache
      • org.jetel.ctl.extensions.TLFormatterCache
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TLCalendarCache, TLDateFormatLocaleCache, TLNumericFormatLocaleCache

    public abstract class TLFormatterCache
extends TLCache
    A base TLCache implementation that can store TLFunctionCallContext and caches Locale and TimeZoneProvider.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TLFormatterCache

    • Method Detail

      • getLocale

        protected java.util.Locale getLocale(java.lang.String localeString)
        Returns a Locale instance for the given locale ID. If the input string is null or empty, returns default Locale from the context.

        Examples:
        en en.GB fr fr.FR cs cs.CZ

        Caches the last instance. A call to this method updates previousLocaleString as a side effect.
        Parameters:
        localeString - locale ID
        Returns:
        cached Locale

      • getTimeZone

        protected TimeZoneProvider getTimeZone(java.lang.String timeZoneString)
        Returns a TimeZoneProvider instance for the given time zone string. If the input string is null or empty, returns default TimeZoneProvider from the context.

        Examples:
        Europe/Prague America/Los_Angeles

        Caches the last instance. A call to this method updates previousTimeZoneString as a side effect.
        Parameters:
        timeZoneString - time zone string
        Returns:
        cached TimeZoneProvider
